segments.text: That was a beautiful car . It ’ s a new car , but it ’ s totaled .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , your insurance covers sufficient money to replace it . So you don ’ t need to worry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think I could afford that kind of car again . I think I ’ ll have to choose something that is not as hard to replace .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since you are not the one who caused the accident , your insurance cost should be the same .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What will happen if I chose a smaller car ? Would the payments be the same ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you got a smaller car , the cost should be a little less depending on the model , age , and size . Would you still want full coverage ?
segments.speaker: S2
